Topic.Title: Error in Creating a New Story

Posts.EditableText:
So I'm a user of textadventures through the browser and in trying to create a new quest game I'm greeted with a "Sorry, an error occurred while processing your request." message can anyone tell me what's going on?

And before anyone comes with the browser explanation just know I've tried it on every browser I have installed on my computer one of which includes Google Chrome
Posts.HTML:
So I'm a user of textadventures through the browser and in trying to create a new quest game I'm greeted with a "Sorry, an error occurred while processing your request." message can anyone tell me what's going on?

And before anyone comes with the browser explanation just know I've tried it on every browser I have installed on my computer one of which includes Google Chrome

Posts.EditableText:
You can't create games unless you have a secure connection. There should be a padlock icon to the left of the address if it's right.

Check that the address starts with `https://`, not `http://`.
Posts.HTML:
You can't create games unless you have a secure connection. There should be a padlock icon to the left of the address if it's right.

Check that the address starts with https://, not http://.
